name: @scramjet/python-runner
description: This package is part of Scramjet Transform Hub. The package executes user code inside a python process communicating with Transform Hub.

scripts.preinstall: pip install --upgrade -r requirements.txt --target dist; cp -r ../../python/scramjet-framework/scramjet/ dist/
scripts.build: mkdir -p dist; cp -r *.py ../../python/scramjet-framework/scramjet/ package.json dist/; yarn prepack

author: Scramjet <opensource@scramjet.org>
